text: (bad‌ṟil) ēṟṟumuṭṭiya ā raṇṭ vibhāgaṅṅaḷil tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷkkeāru dr̥ṣṭāntamuṇṭ‌. oru vibhāgaṁ allāhuvinṟe mārgattil yud'dhaṁ ceyyunnu. maṟuvibhāgamākaṭṭe satyaniṣēdhikaḷuṁ. (aviśvāsikaḷkk‌) taṅṅaḷuṭe dr̥ṣṭiyil avar (viśvāsikaḷ) taṅṅaḷuṭe iraṭṭiyuṇṭennāṇ tēānniyirunnat‌. allāhu tān uddēśikkunnavarkk tanṟe sahāyaṁ keāṇṭ pinbalaṁ nalkunnu. tīrccayāyuṁ kaṇṇuḷḷavarkk atil oru guṇapāṭhamuṇṭ‌
